cause.description:
Doctors Without Borders, or Medecins Sans Frontieres, is an international medical humanitarian organization that delivers emergency aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, natural or man-made disasters, or exclusion from health care in more than 70 countries.
1. During war or strife, healthcare must be delivered to those in need
2. It is wonderful of you to join, but please contribute as well. Even a small amount can make a huge difference.
cause.name: Doctors Without Borders: Goal $1 million
